patthana8.35:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana8.35:1.1_0: Mind consciousness doesn’t give rise to mind.
patthana8.35:1.1_1: Mind consciousness doesn’t give rise to the mind.
patthana8.35:1.1_2: Mind consciousness doesn’t arise dependent on the mind and thoughts.
patthana8.35:2.1_0: Mind consciousness doesn’t give rise to mind.
patthana8.35:3.1_0: Mind consciousness doesn’t give rise to thought. Existence is a cause.
patthana8.35:4.1_0: (These five discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
